Texts.Eng: This strange energy seems to be spinning like a top. I've molded it into a more contained form that you can use for crafting, and you should now be able to do the same. Go craft the Spira in an anvil and start digging!

You plan to visit many places it seems, and I only realized now that your travels would be made easier if your mining tools were improved. I have begun working on a prototype that I need your help to build: if you can defeat ^green;monsters that can spin,^reset; I may be able to figure something out.^white;
